division: Andaman and Nicobar Islands Transport Department
description: AN-01 is the primary Regional Transport Office for the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, headquartered in the capital city of Sri Vijaya Puram (formerly Port Blair). It is the central authority for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and enforcement of the Motor Vehicles Act across the South and Middle Andaman regions.
address: Directorate of Transport, A&N Administration, Tagore Road, Sri Vijaya Puram, Andaman & Nicobar Islands

description: The AN-02 RTO serves the Nicobar District of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, based in Car Nicobar. It is responsible for vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and transport permit management for the Nicobar group of islands. The office operates under the Directorate of Transport of the Union Territory administration.
address: Office of the Assistant Engineer, STS Unit, Car Nicobar, Nicobar District, Andaman and Nicobar Islands
